headline.main: Mertens Nets Double as Napoli Upset Roma
headline.print_headline: Mertens Nets Double as Napoli Upset Roma

lead_paragraph: Dries Mertens scored twice as third-placed Napoli upset AS Roma 2-1 away on Saturday and moved to within two points of them in the Serie A standings.
snippet: Dries Mertens scored twice as third-placed Napoli upset AS Roma 2-1 away on Saturday and moved to within two points of them in the Serie A standings....
